medical_history.chief_complaint: Abnormal movements and seizures in a 28-day-old infant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The parents noted abnormal movements from birth, initially 1-3 episodes/day that increased to 4-5 seizures/hour lasting 1-2 minutes one day prior to admission. Seizures persisted until antiepileptic treatment was initiated.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient received oral cholecalciferol for rickets prophylaxis before admission, switched to oral calcitriol upon diagnosis of hypoparathyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of epilepsy, neurological, or other metabolic disorders, including hypocalcemia.
